I've been playing CS since 1.5. And somehow i am still here. maybe its the nostalgia, its certainly not the game play. it's fun, its angering, its counter-strike. Make some friends, scrim it up, get in the DM, have some fun.

CSGO Is probably one of the greatest games of all time, and definitely shows the love the valve puts into their games, at least until they started ignoring it a while back - BUT now theyve released danger zone, skins, and are actively trying to make the best of the huge community of FPS lovers that this game has amassed.
The game is still fun, just not the same as it used to be
